attributes.action: Refund for all faulty tumble dryers, from hotpoint, creda and indesit
attributes.additional_details:
People's home insurance will not cover these machines even the modified ones or replacement ones which are still recalled models,
It's been on tv regarding this and they still refuse to refund people as people have lost all trust in using any of there products 
Fire brigades have even told people to stop using them 
They are not thinking about our safety people are dying in house fires 
We need your help before more homes are destroyed and people lives are taken away
attributes.background: Over 5 million tumble dryers have been recalled due to a manufacturing fault yet we are being told it can take months to get fixed in this time people's home/lives are being destroyed as they continue to tell us they are safe to use

rejection.details:
